body:
Style nit: To be consistent with the styling used in the rest of this file, `const char* cname` instead of `const char *cname` etc.

Would you mind running [`clang-format`](http://clang.llvm.org/docs/ClangFormat.html) on C/C++ source code and [`google-java-format`](https://github.com/google/google-java-format) on Java source code to ensure consistent formatting?
body_html:
Style nit: To be consistent with the styling used in the rest of this file, const char* cname instead of const char *cname etc.

Would you mind running clang-format on C/C++ source code and google-java-format on Java source code to ensure consistent formatting?
